name: Atoms of Gold between Ore & Ether
description:
2K animation

8 seconds

30 fps

This animation represents the physical origins & location of the NFT space.

Gold is instrumental in computers and gold is still also used as a medium of transaction. Just like NFTs have their origin in cryptocurrency, gold too has its origins as a currency. More importantly today, gold occupies a very central role in the functioning of internet infrastructure & the Ethereum blockchain.

In terms of the material qualities of the “metaverse”, there is no cloud, cyberspace or Ethereum Virtual Machine without hardware made from materials like gold, extracted from mineral deposits in the Earth’s crust.

The location of the NFT space is somewhat of a non-space. Even so, it has to exist somewhere within the limits of physical space. Is it an underground place where the technology is from or is it a place in the skies that we associate it with?

Probably somewhere in between.

This piece was inspired by the sculptures of Richard Long, the NFT Crystals of FVCKRENDER, the imagining of digitality in terms of architecture by markdorf.tez & the gold-tinted vistas of pristine wilderness by the Hudson River School painters.
